title: Bug 3666: CodeCompletion Hungry code assist
description:
Bug 3666: CodeCompletion Hungry code assist (1GDRYW5)

Under certain circumstances, code assist eats too much code. Consider the enclosed class. As a programmer, I must add a parameter to the baz call in bar to make the program correct.

Steps:
1. Place the cursor after the first "x." in the baz call.
2. Press Ctrl+Space to bring up code assist.
3. Type "f" to filter the list.
4. Select "foo()" from the filtered list.
OB: When using code assist in the given situation, the code assist is eating too much code.
EB: The code assist should only complete the "foo()" portion of the baz call.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Change the baz call to "baz(x.x.foo())".
2. Place the cursor after the first "x." in the baz call.
3. Press Ctrl+Space to bring up code assist.
4. Type "f" to filter the list.
5. Select "foo()" from the filtered list.
